deprecation.message:
Inital Setup Publised version.
Please use pre-release and keep track on github project to know the roadmap

description:
OpenXML Word Processor is a versatile .NET library that streamlines the
      creation and manipulation of Word documents using the OpenXML SDK. Designed for ease of use,
      it offers developers an extensive range of features for generating text, applying styles and
      formatting, creating tables, and managing images. Whether you're automating document creation,
      generating dynamic reports, or processing large volumes of text, this library provides the
      tools needed for precise and efficient Word document handling. Embrace the power of
      programmatic document creation with OpenXML Word Processor, and elevate your application's
      document processing functionality.
